00020 namespace detail
00021 {
00022         inline void* _create_guid()
00023         {
00024                 module::guid* g = new module::guid();
00025                 g->reset();
00026                 return g;
00027         }
00028 
00029         inline void _delete_guid(void* inst)
00030         {
00031                 delete (module::guid*)inst;
00032         }
00033 } // namespace
00034 
00035 reflect_struct(module::guid, "guid")
00036         .def_ctor_custom(&::detail::_create_guid, &::detail::_delete_guid)
00037         .def_parsable()
00038 end_reflection()
00039 
00040 
00041 reflect_class(module::IUnknown, "IUnknown")
00042         .def_method("AddRef", AddRef)
00043         .def_method("Release", Release)
00044 end_reflection()
